# none

**Type Property**

The receiver is unable to scroll.

## Declaration

```swift
static let none: CAScrollLayerScrollMode
```

## Constants

- **vertically**: The receiver is able to scroll vertically.
- **horizontally**: The receiver is able to scroll horizontally.
- **both**: The receiver is able to scroll both horizontally and vertically.

items.description: The receiver is able to scroll vertically.
items.name: vertically

items.description: The receiver is able to scroll horizontally.
items.name: horizontally

items.description: The receiver is able to scroll both horizontally and vertically.
items.name: both
